featuredEvents.title: Ethereum Developer Conference 2025
featuredEvents.description: Join the largest Ethereum developer conference with workshops, talks, and networking opportunities.

events.title: Web3 Security Workshop
events.description: Learn about the latest security practices for Web3 applications and smart contracts.

events.title: Solidity Bootcamp
events.description: Intensive 3-day bootcamp for learning Solidity from basics to advanced concepts.

events.title: DeFi Summit 2025
events.description: Explore the future of decentralized finance with industry leaders and innovators.

announcements.title: DevBase Now Supports Solana Projects
announcements.content: We're excited to announce that DevBase now supports Solana projects! Explore the growing ecosystem of Solana developers and projects.

announcements.title: Join Our Discord Community
announcements.content: Connect with fellow developers, share your projects, and get help from the community in our Discord server.

announcements.title: Upcoming Maintenance: May 30
announcements.content: DevBase will be undergoing scheduled maintenance on May 30 from 2-4 AM UTC. Some features may be temporarily unavailable.
